name: 21st Century Recombinatorial Delirium : An Ode to K-Punk R.I.P.
description:
A quote by Mark fisher, printed by an artist and stuck to my studio wall as a reminder: "While 20th Century experimental culture was seized by a recombinatorial delirium, which made it feel as if newness was infinitely available, the 21st Century is oppressed by a crushing sense of finitude and exhaustion. It doesn't feel like the future. Or alternatively, it doesn't feel as if the 21st Century has started yet. We remain trapped in the 20th century."
-Original audio produced by James Alec Hardy 2021
